verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 1.Nasikia sauti nzuri kama ya malaika ni sauti toka mbinguni,sauti ya Mungu

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Aniita mimi niende nikamtumikie,anitume shambani mwake nikavune yote

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Umeniita ,nimeitika wito nakuja kwako leo
najongea mbele zako Bwana nipokee mimi,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: nikotayari nimeyaacho yote najikabithi kwako,unitume popote nami nitakwenda haraka.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: 2.Ninaenda mimi naenda,ninaenda mwenyewe.Ninaenda mbele za Bwana ,sitarudi nyuma

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines: Ndugu zangu na marafiki mniache niende nikafanye kazi ya Bwana,nitakapotumwa.

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines:
3.Nilitazama moyo wako,moyo wako mwanangu
hata kabla hujazaliwa

verse.name: c1f
verse.lines: nilikutambua nilikuteua mapema kati ya ndugu zako uwe kuhani wangu mimi,kuhani mkuu.

verse.name: c1g
verse.lines: 4.Shamba lako Bwana ni kubwa na mavuno ni mengi wavunaji ndio wachache

verse.name: c1h
verse.lines: nitakwenda mimi nakuomba sana ee Bwana nipeleke shambani nikavune mavuno yote yaliyotayari

verse.name: c1i
verse.lines: 5.Uwe nami siku kwa siku, Bwana usiniache unikinge na majaribu nilinde daima

verse.name: c1j
verse.lines: nipeleke habari njema ulimwenguni mwote watu wote wakutambue wakugeukie.
